text: frd allah ealaykum -ayha almwmnwn- qital alkfar, walqital mkrwh lakum min jihat altbe; lmshqth wakathrat mkhatrh, waqad tkrhwn shyyana wahu fi haqiqatih khayr lkm, waqad tuhibuwn shyyana lamaa fih min alrrahat 'aw alldht aleajlt, wahu sharun lkm. wallah taealaa yaelam ma hu khayr lkm, wa'antum la taelamun dhalik. fbadru 'iilaa aljhad fi sbylh
